name: Cabinet
maker: Case by Guillaume Benneman, Gilt-bronze mounts after models by Gilles-François Martin, Mounts cast by Etienne-Jean Forestier, et al
description: Cabinet; Case by Guillaume Benneman (French, died 1811), Gilt-bronze mounts after models by Gilles-François Martin (French, about 1713 - 1795), Mounts cast by Etienne-Jean Forestier (French, master 1764), et al; Paris, France; 1788; pietra dura plaque late 17th - 18th century; Oak veneered with ebony, mahogany, and lacquer, set with pietra dura plaques; gilt bronze mounts; bleu turquin marble top; 91.3 x 165.4 x 64.1 cm, 224.5305 kg (35 15/16 x 65 1/8 x 25 1/4 in., 495 lb.); 78.DA.361; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Cabinet
medium: Oak veneered with ebony, mahogany, and lacquer, set with pietra dura plaques; gilt bronze mounts; bleu turquin marble top
